BJP-led NDA Has Filed Almost 80 Sedition Cases Annually Since Coming to Power

In comparison, the Congress-led UPA filed 62 cases every year between 2010 and 2014

Cases Filed During

BJP-led NDA Rule (2014*-20)

=

516

Cases Filed During

Cong.-led UPA (2010-14)

=

279

Source: Article14.com
